DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the percentage of patients who would reach a cholesterol goal after atorvastatin treatment.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Efficacy Of Atorvastatin In Lowering Cholesterol In Latin American Patients With High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Patients with high cholesterol eligible for treatment with baseline LDLC level of less than or equal to 220 mg/dL Willingness to follow diet Triglycerides less than or equal to 400 mg/dL Hemoglobin A1c >10%
